thread.title: Verena
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Verena

author: Verena
title: Verena
text: The only hard thing about this was that there were so many good choices that it was hard to decide. The whole process was then made easy even for a first time framer; from the matting to the dimensions, everything worked beautifully. When the frame arrived, I was amazed how well it was packaged! Instructions were good and the end product was excellent! Certainly will use this company again!
